guide.introduction: For a long time I've been under the impression that ranch dressing was a magical concoction that I'd never be able to make myself. Oh, how I was wrong! Not only is it possible, but it's easy!
guide.introduction_rendered:
For a long time I've been under the impression that ranch dressing was a magical concoction that I'd never be able to make myself. Oh, how I was wrong! Not only is it possible, but it's easy!

Relevant parts
  • Mayonnaise
  • Yogurt
  • Milk
  • Celery leaves
  • Dill
  • Onion
  • Garlic
  • Dijon mustard
  • Lemon juice
  • Salt
  • Pepper
Tools
  • Cutting board
  • Food processor
  • Knife
  • Measuring cup
  • Mixing bowl
  • Whisk

lines.text: Using your food processor if you have one or a knife if you don't, dice the onion and garlic (I used a shallot since I *gasp* ran out of garlic).
lines.text_raw: Using your food processor if you have one or a knife if you don't, dice the onion and garlic (I used a shallot since I *gasp* ran out of garlic).

lines.text: Dice (don't food-process) the dill and celery.
lines.text_raw: Dice (don't food-process) the dill and celery.

lines.text: Combine all ingredients in your bowl and whisk up the concoction.
lines.text_raw: Combine all ingredients in your bowl and whisk up the concoction.

lines.text: Don't forget to taste it, and adjust your seasonings accordingly.
lines.text_raw: Don't forget to taste it, and adjust your seasonings accordingly.

lines.text: For full effect, let your dressing sit in the fridge for an hour before serving. This lets the flavors combine.
lines.text_raw: For full effect, let your dressing sit in the fridge for an hour before serving. This lets the flavors combine.

lines.text: It's great on salads and as a dip for veggies and chicken wings. I've been experimenting with adding less and less mayo, which yields a lighter flavor.
lines.text_raw: It's great on salads and as a dip for veggies and chicken wings. I've been experimenting with adding less and less mayo, which yields a lighter flavor.

guide.summary: It's easy to make your own delicious, healthy ranch dressing.
guide.title: Ranch Dressing
